Sentencas: The chemical instability of perovskite oxides containing Sr is a critical issue for the long-term operation of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Sol-Gel Combustion-Assisted Electrostatic Spray Deposition for Durable Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathodes

Sentencas: In this study, we demonstrate a remarkable improvement in the chemical and electrochemical stability of a heterostructured La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC)-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (GDC) electrode.
Titulo: Sol-Gel Combustion-Assisted Electrostatic Spray Deposition for Durable Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathodes

Sentencas: Electrostatic spray deposition was employed to fabricate heterostructured nanoparticles in a single step with a coaxial nozzle supplying the LSC powders in the core nozzle and the GDC precursors in the shell nozzle.
Titulo: Sol-Gel Combustion-Assisted Electrostatic Spray Deposition for Durable Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathodes

Sentencas: Moreover, the reducing fuel added to the GDC precursor solution induced the sol-gel combustion reaction in the droplet to form a uniform nanocrystalline GDC coating with high surface coverage.
Titulo: Sol-Gel Combustion-Assisted Electrostatic Spray Deposition for Durable Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathodes

Sentencas: The high surface coverage of GDC on the LSC more significantly improved long-term stability compared with than of the bare LSC cathode at a constant current density of 1 A/cm(2) at 600 degrees C for 100 h.
Titulo: Sol-Gel Combustion-Assisted Electrostatic Spray Deposition for Durable Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Cathodes
